data.text:
Cory Doctorow Gallery | Quotes | Relationships

Description[]

Cory Efram Doctorow (born July 17, 1971) was a Canadian-British blogger, journalist, and science fiction author who serves as co-editor of the blog Boing Boing. He is an activist in favour of liberalizing copyright laws and a proponent of the Creative Commons organization, using some of their licenses for his books. Some common themes of his work include digital rights management, file sharing, and post-scarcity economics.

History[]
